## üöÄ Usage

Demo: <https://gatsby-multilanguage-website.vercel.app/>  
Tutorial: <https://www.storyblok.com/tp/gatsby-multilanguage-website-tutorial?utm_source=github.com&utm_medium=readme&utm_campaign=gatsbyjs-multilanguage-website>

<img src="https://img.storyblok.com/ZvYBhnjPopyB4ExBdo94o-UxnXc=/840x0/f/88751/2880x2048/47fb3aa687/gatsbyjs_demo.jpg" width="400px" />


### Run

``` bash
# install dependencies
$ npm install # Or yarn install

# serve with hot reload at localhost:8000
$ npm run develop # or yarn dev
```

### Setup

1. [Register](https://app.storyblok.com/#!/signup?utm_source=github.com&utm_medium=readme&utm_campaign=gatsbyjs-multilanguage-website) at Storyblok for free.
2. Duplicate Example Space by clicking this link: <https://app.storyblok.com/#!/build/95016>
3. Follow our [Gatsby Storyblok Guide](https://www.storyblok.com/tp/gatsby-multilanguage-website-tutorial?utm_source=github.com&utm_medium=readme&utm_campaign=gatsbyjs-multilanguage-website)

For detailed explanation on how things work, checkout the [Gatsby docs](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/) and for the whole Setup you can have a look at [our step by step guide for Gatsby and Storyblok](**https://www.storyblok.com/tp/gatsby-multilanguage-website-tutorial?utm_source=github.com&utm_medium=readme&utm_campaign=gatsbyjs-multilanguage-website**)

## üîó Related Links

* **[Gatsby.js Hub](https://www.storyblok.com/tc/gatsbyjs?utm_source=github.com&utm_medium=readme&utm_campaign=gatsbyjs-multilanguage-website)**: Learn how to develop your own Gatsby.js applications that use Storyblok APIs to retrieve and manage content;
* **[Storyblok & Gatsby.js on GitHub](https://github.com/search?q=org%3Astoryblok+topic%3Agatsby)**: Check all of our Gatsby.js open source repos;
* **[Rich Text Renderer for React](https://github.com/claus/storyblok-rich-text-react-renderer)**: Renders Storyblok rich text content to React elements.
